name: Fruit Basket (itch)
description:
Choose where to put your fruits and vegetables, score 1000 and win! Use arrow keys to move left and right.

Let daddy and mommy help you recognizing the poor modeled things (yes, Cucumber, I'm talking to you. And to you Apple, too).

Have fun!

/*

Game made for the OneGameAMonth, August 2017, theme: Anthropomorphism).

*/
